        Compress a file.

      • zip

        public static boolean zip(java.io.File zipFile,
                          java.lang.String file,
                          boolean delete)
        Compress a file and can delete original file.
        Parameters:
        zipFile - The file where store the file.
        file - The absolute path of the file.
        delete - True to delete the original file, false not delete.
        Returns:
        Success true, false otherwise and not replace the original file.

      • zip

        public static boolean zip(java.io.File zipFile,
                          java.lang.String[] files,
                          boolean delete)
        Compress an array of files and can delete original files.
        Parameters:
        zipFile - The file where store the file.
        file - The absolute path of the file.
        delete - True to delete the original file, false not delete.
        Returns:
        Success true, false otherwise and not replace the original file.
